description.raw:
Following the same philosophy of pull request #64, I combined the old `gazebo_ros_color` and `symbol_controller` plugins into a new `placard_plugin` for avoiding to publish ROS topics with the shape and color displayed in each placard.

In the new approach, everything happens inside the Gazebo plugin. Optionally, a ROS service can be exposed to generate a new shape and color in the placard.

_**~~Note: ~~**~~This pull request is built atop of pull request #64, which needs to be merged first.~~_
description.html:

In the new approach, everything happens inside the Gazebo plugin. Optionally, a ROS service can be exposed to generate a new shape and color in the placard.

Note: This pull request is built atop of pull request #64, which needs to be merged first.
